Package array

Class ClassReflection

java.lang.Object
array.ClassReflection
public final class ClassReflection extends Object
Provides reflection-related utility methods for working with classes.

  • Constructor Summary

  • Method Details

    • forName

      public static Class forName(String name) throws ReflectionException
      Returns the Class object associated with the class or interface with the supplied string name.
      Parameters:
      name - The fully qualified name of the class or interface.
      Returns:
      The Class object associated with the specified name.
      Throws:
      ReflectionException - If the class is not found.

    • getSimpleName

      public static String getSimpleName(Class c)
      Returns the simple name of the underlying class as supplied in the source code.
      Parameters:
      c - The Class object for which to get the simple name.
      Returns:
      The simple name of the class.

    • isInstance

      public static boolean isInstance(Class c, Object obj)
      Determines if the supplied Object is assignment-compatible with the object represented by supplied Class.
      Parameters:
      c - The Class object.
      obj - The object to check compatibility with.
      Returns:
      true if the object is assignment-compatible with the class represented by c; otherwise, false.

    • isAssignableFrom

      public static boolean isAssignableFrom(Class c1, Class c2)
      Determines if one class is assignable from another class.
      Parameters:
      c1 - The first Class object.
      c2 - The second Class object.
      Returns:
      true if c2 is either the same as, or a subclass or superinterface of c1; otherwise, false.

      public static boolean isMemberClass(Class c)
      Returns true if the class or interface represented by the supplied Class is a member class.
      Parameters:
      c - The Class object.
      Returns:
      true if the class is a member class; otherwise, false.

      Returns:

    • newInstance

      public static <T> T newInstance(Class<T> c) throws ReflectionException
      Creates a new instance of the class represented by the supplied Class.
      Type Parameters:

      Parameters:
      c - The Class object.
      Returns:
      A new instance of the specified class.
      Throws:
      ReflectionException - If instantiation fails.

    • getComponentType

      public static Class getComponentType(Class c)
      Returns the Class representing the component type of an array. If this class does not represent an array class, this method returns null.
      Parameters:
      c - The Class object.
      Returns:
      The Class representing the component type of an array, or null if the class is not an array.

    • getConstructors

      public static Constructor[] getConstructors(Class c)
      Returns an array of Constructor containing the public constructors of the class represented by the supplied Class.
      Parameters:
      c - The Class object.
      Returns:
      An array of Constructor objects representing the public constructors.

    • getConstructor

      public static Constructor getConstructor(Class c, Class... parameterTypes) throws ReflectionException
      Returns a Constructor that represents the public constructor for the supplied class which takes the supplied parameter types.
      Parameters:
      c - The Class object.
      parameterTypes - The parameter types of the constructor.
      Returns:
      A Constructor object representing the public constructor.
      Throws:
      ReflectionException - If the constructor cannot be found.

    • getDeclaredConstructor

      Parameters:
      c - The Class object.
      parameterTypes - The parameter types of the constructor.
      Returns:
      A Constructor object representing the constructor.
      Throws:
      ReflectionException - If the constructor cannot be found.

      Parameters:
      c - The Class object.
      Returns:
      An array of enum constants, or null if the class is not an enum.

    • getMethod

      public static Method getMethod(Class c, String name, Class... parameterTypes) throws ReflectionException
      Returns a Method that represents the public member method for the supplied class with the specified name and parameter types.
      Parameters:
      c - The Class object.
      name - The name of the method.
      parameterTypes - The parameter types of the method.
      Returns:
      A Method object representing the public method.
      Throws:
      ReflectionException - If the method cannot be found.

    • isAnnotationPresent

      public static boolean isAnnotationPresent(Class c, Class<? extends Annotation> annotationType)
      Returns true if the supplied class includes an annotation of the given type.
      Parameters:
      c - The Class object.
      annotationType - The type of the annotation.
      Returns:
      true if the class includes the specified annotation; otherwise, false.

    • getAnnotations

      public static Annotation[] getAnnotations(Class c)
      Returns an array of Annotation objects reflecting all annotations declared by the supplied class, and inherited from its superclass. Returns an empty array if there are none.
      Parameters:
      c - The Class object.
      Returns:
      An array of Annotation objects representing the annotations.

    • getAnnotation

      public static Annotation getAnnotation(Class c, Class<? extends Annotation> annotationType)
      Returns an Annotation object reflecting the annotation provided, or null if this class doesn't have such an annotation. This is a convenience function if the caller knows already which annotation type he's looking for.
      Parameters:
      c - The Class object.
      annotationType - The type of the annotation.
      Returns:
      An Annotation object representing the specified annotation, or null if not found.

    • getDeclaredAnnotations

      public static Annotation[] getDeclaredAnnotations(Class c)
      Returns an array of Annotation objects reflecting all annotations declared by the supplied class, or an empty array if there are none. Does not include inherited annotations.
      Parameters:
      c - The Class object.
      Returns:
      An array of Annotation objects representing the declared annotations.

    • getDeclaredAnnotation

      public static Annotation getDeclaredAnnotation(Class c, Class<? extends Annotation> annotationType)
      Returns an Annotation object reflecting the annotation provided, or null if this class doesn't have such an annotation. This is a convenience function if the caller knows already which annotation type he's looking for.
      Parameters:
      c - The Class object.
      annotationType - The type of the annotation.
      Returns:
      An Annotation object representing the specified annotation, or null if not found.

    • getInterfaces

      public static Class[] getInterfaces(Class c)
      Returns an array of Class objects representing the interfaces implemented by the supplied class.
      Parameters:
      c - The Class object.
      Returns:
      An array of Class objects representing the implemented interfaces.
